dcterms:creator: A. E. W. Johnson
D. Demner-Fushman
T.-Y. Lin
dcterms:description: A large publicly available dataset of chest radiographs in DICOM format with free-text radiology reports. This dataset consists of 377,110 images corresponding to 227,835 radiographic studies performed at the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center in Boston, MA.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-CXR

dcterms:creator: D. Demner-Fushman
dcterms:description: The Indiana University Chest X-Ray Collection contains radiology reports associated with X-Ray images. This dataset contains 7,470 image-report pairs. All the reports enclose the following sections: impression, findings, tags, comparison, and indication.
dcterms:title: Open-I

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
dcterms:description: A large-scale non-medical dataset for scene understanding, commonly used for training and benchmarking object detection, segmentation, and captioning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO
